snippet.title: The Crust Gameplay Trailer Kickstarter 2024
snippet.description:
Kickstarter: 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/the-crust/the-crust?ref=5tydvd

Add Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1465470/The_Crust/

The Crust is a riveting sci-fi factory management game featuring automation, exploration, and trading elements set on a dying Earth.

Automate a lunar base as you become the savior of humanity exploring the future on the Moon. Mine, craft, research and trade resources with Earth in this gripping narrative basebuilder.
